dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare enter my domain, insignificant mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge and power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge and power, you say? Pity, they will not aid you here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will take what I desire by force!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravado, a common trait among the weak. You shall regret your choice.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to face me!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, you have sealed your fate. Prepare for annihilation!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave and trouble you no further.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, for your presence here is an annoyance. Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand and learn from you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity from a mere mortal? Pathetic. Ignorance will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Teach me or face the consequences!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You overstep, pestilent being. There is no place for you here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will retreat and bother you no more.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Good riddance, may you never return to cross my path!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer a pact of mutual benefit.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A pact? Your words amuse me, insignificant creature. Speak your terms.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Join forces with me against a common enemy.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Partnership with a mortal? Hilarious! Prepare to face my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will retract my offer and leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your agreement means nothing to me. Disappear from my sight!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking no conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Your presence disturbs the balance here. I shall not tolerate it.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will defend myself if necessary.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defend yourself, you say? You are already doomed, pitiful creature.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand ready for whatever may come.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your readiness is futile. Face oblivion with dignity!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will depart and leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave now and never return. Your presence sickens me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer to share knowledge and insights.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words are hollow, mortal. You possess nothing of value to me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My knowledge surpasses yours; let me enlighten you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance! You have sealed your fate with your insolence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall depart and trouble you no more.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Vanish from my sight, insignificant one. Your presence sickens me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer peace and willingness to coexist.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? Your naivety astounds me. Prepare for the consequences of your delusion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will engage in friendly cooperation if you allow it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Friendly cooperation? Ridiculous! You have forced my hand, prepare for destruction!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will retreat and bother you no more.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Retreat, coward! Your actions speak volumes of your weakness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge your power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge my power, do you? Bold words for a fool who knows not what they face.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Face me and prove your strength!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You shall regret your arrogance for eternity. Prepare for obliteration!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge my error and will leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Acknowledgment of your foolishness will not save you. Depart now!
